%matplotlib inline
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import seaborn as sns
sns.set_style('darkgrid')

plt.figure(figsize=(12, 4))
sns.barplot( x='val',y='name', data=color,palette= "GnBu_r")
plt.xlabel("count", size=14)
plt.ylabel("color", size=14)

source.c6a3e2cd:
Eng=pd.DataFrame(df['extraFeatures.EngineCapacity'])
Eng.rename(columns=lambda x: x.replace('extraFeatures.EngineCapacity', 'power'), inplace=True)
eng=pd.DataFrame()
eng['val']=Eng.power.value_counts().iloc[:10]
eng['power']=Eng.power.value_counts().iloc[:10].index
eng['percent']=eng.val/total*100
print(eng.head(10))
